attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Are we wasting our time here?  It seems that the larger the amount of signatures on a petition then lower the chance of it being taken into consideration.  This is in no way intended to be humorous and it is directly related to government policy.  If a certain amount of people sign a petition then it should automatically go to a vote for mp's.  What that required amount should be is up for debate.

reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
